en.title: FE's "Hope For Children" Donates Baht 600,000 to Poor and Needy Children of Thailand!
en.content:
FE's "Hope For Children" Charity Program together with Presidential Director Jankij's team donated Baht 600,000 (Hope For Children contributed 50%) to help poor and needy children of Thailand.

At Presidential Director Jankij's Presidential Directors Recognition Event on 30th August 2009 held at Rama Garden Hotel, Bangkok, FusionExcel Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee presented mock cheques to the following:

- Baht 300,000 Library Hin Kong Withaya School, Khon Kaen.

- Baht 200,000 Sutasini Noi-in Foundation, Yaso Thorn.

- Baht 100,000 for Computers for Tung Pong Mitrapap School, Mae Hong Son.
